
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VRgbToYiq.cpp
          VRgbToYiq.h
          VRgbToYiq__Syms.cpp
          VRgbToYiq__Syms.h
  DEPENDS RgbToYiq.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/RgbToYiq.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VRgbToYiq STATIC VRgbToYiq.cpp VRgbToYiq__Syms.cpp
    RgbToYiq.v
)

target_compile_options(VRgbToYiq PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VRgbToYiq PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VRgbToYiq verilated)
